item.title: CX Season Reflection
item.description: With only one race to go in this seasons calendar (Sean Sharkey next Sunday) itâ€™s time to reflect on the CX season.

item.title: CX National Championships
item.description: Image Credit: SportsPhoto Ireland What a venue, what a course. Thank you Greenmount Cycling Academy for treating us to a spectacular weekend.

item.title: World Cup Dublin Support Race
item.description: It is such a treat to be able to practice and race on a UCI World Cup course as a u14 rider.

item.title: Cuchulainn TT & Road Race
item.description: Cuchulainn Cycling Club were hosting this years Leinster Time Trial and Road Race Championships. I raced both the TT and road race last year so knew the course quite well.

item.title: Kanturk Youth 2 Day
item.description: The weekend started with the long drive from Dublin to Kanturk. The weather on the drive down suggested it was going to be a warm weekend ðŸŒž.

item.title: Galway Wind Park
item.description: The day following the final round of The Bog Trials the organiser, Mick, arranged for a social gravel spin around the Galway Wind Park.

item.title: The Bog Trials - Round 4
item.description: It was the last round of The Bog Trials and that can only mean one thing, burgers.

item.title: Race Schedule
item.description: February 2023 04th Saturday Round 1 The Bog Trials 11th Saturday Round 2 The Bog Trials 18th Saturday Round 3

item.title: The Bog Trials - Round 3
item.description: Round 3 and another chance to take on women’s field at The Bog Trials. On the journey down I could see it was going to be a wet race.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Me Reach out to me for sponsorship offers ðŸ˜‰, offers of a place on a world tour development team ðŸ¥º or to find out what I’m up to.

item.title: Garage
item.description: I'm really privileged to have the bikes that I have. I love to spend time on them and they get a lot of use.
